name: Library Game
description:
You are locked into the library and need to escape! Complete your objectives to open the exit. Pull the requested books from the shelves or return loose books to the correct shelves.

A supernatural force is in there with you! Avoid it!

  • LOOK with the MOUSE
  • MOVE with WASD
  • SPRINT by HOLDING LEFT SHIFT (move faster but attract more attention, drains stamina)
  • TOGGLE SNEAK with LEFT CTRL (move slower but more quietly)
  • TOGGLE FLASHLIGHT with F (your battery drains, find spares!)
  • INTERACT - open doors and move books with LEFT CLICK AND DRAG
